name: Coin Flip Worlds
description:
COIN FLIP WORLDS

Coin flip game that was based on another one of my games (Quantum Penny Flip).

Due to a display resolution error you should maximize play window after opening the game in order to properly play it.

HOW TO PLAY

You should click bad coins before they reach the bottom in order to get points.

CREDITS

-JPCard | Programming, Game Design, Art

-Esteban Zapirain | Game Design

-Francisco "Pancho" Calo | Music

-Bensound.com | Music
